main.domain.collaborativeFilterRecommender
Class LMSPearsonMatrixCaseBase

java.lang.Object
  jcolibri.extensions.recommendation.collaborative.MatrixCaseBase
      main.domain.collaborativeFilterRecommender.LMSMatrixCaseBase
          main.domain.collaborativeFilterRecommender.LMSPearsonMatrixCaseBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
jcolibri.cbrcore.CBRCaseBase
public class LMSPearsonMatrixCaseBase
extends LMSMatrixCaseBase

Extension of the MatrixCaseBase that computes similarities among neighbors using the Pearson Correlation.
It uses a minCorrelateItems Factor to weight similar neighbors that have few common correlate items.

Note: Some changes were necessary to make this case base evaluable with the LMSEvaluator.

Version:
1.1
Author:
Tell Mueller-Pettenpohl

minCorrelateItemsFactor

int minCorrelateItemsFactor
Factor that decreases the similarity between users who have fewer than this number of co-rated items. In other words: Decrease evaluation of the similarity of users that rated less items then this factor.

computeSimilarityByDescriptionId

private void computeSimilarityByDescriptionId()
Computes the Pearson Correlation between users in a smart and efficient way. This code is an adaptation of the one developed by Jerome Kelleher and Derek Bridge for the Collaborative Movie Recommender project at University College Cork (Ireland).
